abstract: The two panelists, whose appointments were challenged in March by the tobacco industry, are now under fire from an ethics watchdog group.
snippet: The two panelists, whose appointments were challenged in March by the tobacco industry, are now under fire from an ethics watchdog group.
lead_paragraph: An ethics watchdog group filed a challenge on Monday against two members of a new federal advisory committee for tobacco product safety, saying they should be disqualified because they are consultants for drug companies that make smoking cessation products.

headline.main: Group Objects to 2 Members of Tobacco Safety Panel
headline.print_headline: Group Objects to 2 Members of Tobacco Safety Panel

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington
